name: savanna
description:
CODARcode Savanna runtime framework for high performance, workflow
management using Swift/T and ADIOS.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MPItrampoline: A forwarding MPI implementation that can use any other
MPI implementation via an MPI ABI.

dependencies.name: adios
dependencies.description:
The Adaptable IO System (ADIOS) provides a simple, flexible way for
scientists to describe the data in their code that may need to be
written, read, or processed outside of the running simulation.

dependencies.name: mpix-launch-swift
dependencies.description:
Library that allows a child MPI application to be launched inside a
subset of processes in a parent MPI application.

dependencies.name: tau
dependencies.description:
A portable profiling and tracing toolkit for performance analysis of
parallel programs written in Fortran, C, C++, UPC, Java, Python.
